Package com.pokego.datamodel

Class GameButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokego.datamodel.GameSpriteGroup
      • com.pokego.datamodel.GameSprite
        • com.pokego.datamodel.GameButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameCheckbox
    public class GameButton
extends GameSprite
    GameButton is used to represent a clickable button. It contains a hovered and static GameSprite. When the mouse is hovered over the button, it will display the hovered state. Else, it displays the static state.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameButton​(int x, int y, java.lang.String textureLocation, java.lang.String secondaryTextureLocation, ButtonClass state)
      Constructs the GameButton object at position (x,y) using the static filePath, hovered filePath and the type of button.
      GameButton​(java.lang.String textureLocation, java.lang.String secondaryTextureLocation, ButtonClass state)
      Constructs the GameButton object at position (0,0) using the static filePath, hovered filePath and the type of button.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameButton

        public GameButton​(java.lang.String textureLocation,
                  java.lang.String secondaryTextureLocation,
                  ButtonClass state)
        Constructs the GameButton object at position (0,0) using the static filePath, hovered filePath and the type of button.
        Parameters:
        textureLocation - file location of static button image file.
        secondaryTextureLocation - file location of hovered button image file.
        state - type of button, defined by the ButtonClass enum.

      • GameButton

        public GameButton​(int x,
                  int y,
                  java.lang.String textureLocation,
                  java.lang.String secondaryTextureLocation,
                  ButtonClass state)
        Constructs the GameButton object at position (x,y) using the static filePath, hovered filePath and the type of button.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the GameButton.
        y - The y position of the GameButton.
        textureLocation - file location of static button image file.
        secondaryTextureLocation - file location of hovered button image file.
        state - type of button, defined by the ButtonClass enum.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sb)

        Overrides:
        draw in class GameSprite
        Parameters:
        sb - SpriteBatch

        public void updateBtnState​(float cursorX,
                           float cursorY)
        Updates current button state.
        Parameters:
        cursorX - The current x position of mouse.
        cursorY - The current y position of mouse.

      • hovered

        public boolean hovered​(float cursorX,
                       float cursorY)
        Returns true if button is currently hovered. False otherwise.
        Parameters:
        cursorX - The current x position of mouse.
        cursorY - The current y position of mouse.
        Returns:
        Returns true if button is currently hovered. False otherwise.
